delete.member.title: Remove Member
delete.batch.member.tip: Are you sure you want to remove the selected {count} member(s)?
delete.member.tip: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
set.member.log: Successfully added member “{userName}” as the role “{roleName}”
edit.member.log: Edit “{userName}” as Organization administrator, manage department: “{departmentName}”
set.member.orgaudit.log.message: Successfully set the range of '{name}' to '{memberRange}'
not.limit.user.space: No limit on the maximum allocatable space for User Management
limit.user.space: Limit the maximum allocatable space for User Management to {quota}GB
not.limit.doc.space: No limit on the maximum allocatable space for Document Management
limit.doc.space: Limit the maximum allocatable space for Document Management to {quota}GB
user.deleted: The selected user does not exist.
department.deleted: The selected department does not exist.
usergroup.deleted: The selected user group does not exist.
appaccount.deleted: The selected application account does not exist.
search.name: Search Name
account.name: Account Name
invalid.account.name: Account Name cannot contain \ / : * ? " < > | these special characters, and cannot exceed 128 characters.
duplicate.account.name: This Account Name already exists, please re-enter.
same.account.name: The Application Account Name cannot be the same as the Username.
regenerate.token.tip: Are you sure to regenerate the token for the account “{account}”? Once regenerated, the original token will become invalid.
generate.token.success.tip: Access token generated successfully. Please copy it immediately.
token.tip: For security reasons, the system will not store this token. After closing this popup, you will not be able to view it again. Please copy and save it.
delete.account.tip: After deletion, requests sent using this account's token will be rejected. Once deleted, it cannot be revoked. Are you sure to delete?
account.not.found: This Application Account does not exist.
no.search.result: Sorry, no results matching the criteria were found.
no.match.search.result: no results matching the criteria were found.
role.name: Role Name:
role.name.invalid: Role name cannot contain \ / : * ? " < > | these special characters, and cannot exceed 128 characters.
role.name.duplicate: This role name already exists, please re-enter.
role.description.placeholder: Input a description, noting the role's responsibilities and notes
delete.role.tip: Are you sure you want to delete this role?
resource.name: Resource Name
select.expires.tip: The time you set is earlier than the server's current time, please reset or check the time
cancel.perm.tip: Are you sure you want to cancel the permissions?
cancel.batch.perm.tip: Are you sure you want to cancel the selected {count} permissions?
without.perm.cancel.tip: The selected resource currently  can not be cancelled
operation.policy.tip.first: The policy that the system must execute after a visitor performs a certain operation.
operation.policy.tip.second: E.g.: User A is authorized to preview/download, and the operation policy for preview and download (preview/download watermarked files) is set. Thus, User A can only preview and download watermarked files.
operation.policy.tip.third: If there is no [Setting] button below, there are currently no configurable operation policies; if you want to disable [Set], you need to first set the allowed operation permissions.
set.operation.policy.tip: Please first set the corresponding allowed operation permissions before setting the operation policy.
perm.policy.tip: The Operation Policy of "{perm}" has been set.
product.license.batch: Authorize the selected {count} users for product(s)
product.license.cancel.content: Are you sure you want to cancel all authorizations? Once canceled, users will no longer have access to the authorized products.
product.license.batch.tip: After then, the new product authorization will replace the previous one.
